Sentencas: This work describes new findings concerning the preparation of Y-and Yb-co-doped BaCeO3-BaZrO3 materials, their structural, microstructural, electrical characterization and application as electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: BaCe0.5Zr0.3Y0.2-xYbxO3-δ proton-conducting electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The BaCe(0.5)Zr(0.3)Y(0.2-x)YbxO(3-delta) (x = 0-0.2, Delta x = 0.05) materials are successfully synthesized using a citrate-nitrate combustion method and then sintered at 1450 degrees C to form single-phase and highly dense ceramic samples.
Titulo: BaCe0.5Zr0.3Y0.2-xYbxO3-δ proton-conducting electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sample with the BaCe0.5Zr0.3Y0.1Yb0.1O3-delta (BCZYYb) composition is found to possess the largest grains coupled with the highest ionic conductivity.
Titulo: BaCe0.5Zr0.3Y0.2-xYbxO3-δ proton-conducting electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This ceramic material is used as an electrolyte for the fabrication an electrochemical cell designed as NiO-BCZYYb| BCZYYb (25 mm)| NBFC (where NBFC = Nd0.5Ba0.5Fe1.9Cu0.1O3-delta), which demonstrates as maximal power density as 140 and 290 mW cm(-2) at 600 and 700 degrees C with open circuit voltages higher than 1.01-1.04 V, respectively.
Titulo: BaCe0.5Zr0.3Y0.2-xYbxO3-δ proton-conducting electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The separation of the total resistance of the cell in its ohmic and polarization components allows the film electrolyte conductivity to be calculated, which attains quite high level (2.4 and 3.8 mS cm(-1), respectively).
Titulo: BaCe0.5Zr0.3Y0.2-xYbxO3-δ proton-conducting electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study shows that BaCe0.5Zr0.3Y0.1Yb0.1O3-delta can be used instead of electrolytes with a lower Zr-concentration (for example, BaCe0.7Zr0.1Y0.1Yb0.1O3-delta) with no significant deterioration of the transport properties.
Titulo: BaCe0.5Zr0.3Y0.2-xYbxO3-δ proton-conducting electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
